publication.title: A knowledge-based system to improve the quality and efficiency of titanium melting
publication.keyword: Continuous Improvement;Costs and Benefits;Decision Making;Document Management;Information Technology;Knowledge Acquisition;Knowledge Base;Knowledge Based System;Process Development;System Architecture;Titanium;Decision Support;Electron Beam;Expert System;
publication.abstract: This paper outlines the application of a knowledge-based expert system to assist the furnace production staff in diagnosing and correcting Electron Beam (EB) guns, which are used to melt titanium. The characteristics of a titanium melting facility, its business objectives, and the responsibilities of its furnace operators are reviewed. Alternative solutions to the problem of accurately troubleshooting EB gun failures
